des:
Hardware Requirements:
1. Schlage Breeze Smart Lock
2. Gateway - sold separately
3. Echo/Dot

Get Started:

1. Check that the Schlage Breeze app is able to lock/unlock using Bluetooth.

2. Check that the Schlage Breeze app is able to “remotely” lock/unlock using the Schlage Plus hub

3. Enable the Schlage Breeze skill in Alexa

4.Authorize with Schlage Breeze app account and provide permission to access your locks.

5. Once Alexa discovers the Schlage Breeze Smart Lock, you can issue voice commands to Alexa as outlined below:

With the Schlage Breeze skill you can use Alexa to control two Schlage smart lock models –Schlage Omnia™ and Schlage eGO, both require a Schlage Wi-Fi Bridge (BZ100).
 
With this Alexa skill, you can check the status of your lock and lock/unlock it using voice control. To unlock your smark lock with a voice command, you will need to tell Alexa a four-digit PIN that you create with the Alexa app.
